Reviews.Title: Nice flip phone
Reviews.Author: Jack R. Watkins
Reviews.Content: This is my first flip phone in a few years.  I needed a simple, easy to use phone as a carry around cell phone. It was veryinexpensive,  and simple. I use it and don't have to worry about loosing it or dropping it. It meets all my needs in a dirt cheap phone. I do wish it had better volume. It's not loud by any means. That is my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS LIKE IT SHOULD!
Reviews.Author: Hal Croft "TRUCKER HAL"
Reviews.Content: IT DOES WHAT A CELL PHONE IS SUPPOSED TO DO - IT'S A REALLY GOOD, A LITTLE BIT BASIC, PHONE!

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
VGA digital camera/camcorder; 5 MB built-in memory (no expansion)
Bluetooth for handsfree devices; external caller ID display; phone book with 1,000 entries; access to personal email
Up to 3.8 hours of talk time, up to 220 hours (9+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola V555 Unlocked Cell Phone--U.S. Version with Warranty (Gray/Silver)
